product_name: The North Face Pinyon Daypack - Women's
long_description: Lightweight yet loaded with features, the women's Pinyon Daypack from The North Face is your around-town best buddy for exploring at home or abroad. Women-specific shoulder straps give you perfect fit and comfort. Unique J-shape zipper offers easy access to your jacket or lunch stored in the main compartment. Laptop sleeve padded with ventilated foam can be reached by top or side access; holds up to a 15 in. laptop. Side stretch-mesh pocket holds a water bottle. Front vertical-zippered pocket can stash a hat or guide book; another external zippered pocket has an organization panel. Side-access hydration port lets you slip in a water reservoir (not included) for longer explorations. Perforated back panel with airflow channel increases your comfort. The North Face Pinyon Daypack for women has a reflective patch and a loop that can hold a bike light (light not included), both of which enhance your visibility in low light.
short_description: Lightweight yet loaded with features, the women's Pinyon Daypack from The North Face is your around-town best buddy for exploring at home or abroad.
